title: MD
biography: David Frank Lye is an English cricketer. Lye is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm medium pace. He was born in Exeter, Devon.
aiSummary: David Lye is a infectious disease specialist with an H-index of 96 at National Centre for Infectious Diseases (Member). Has been published in Nature reviews. Immunology, Science, Nature Reviews Nephrology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
